description: A massive colosseum in Dressrosa where gladiator tournaments are held. The current tournament features the Mera Mera no Mi as the grand prize. The colosseum has a round stage surrounded by water with four cardinal walkways leading to it, and three levels of seating for spectators.

keyEvents.title: Block B Battle Begins
keyEvents.description: The Block B battle of the Corrida Colosseum tournament officially begins, featuring multiple competitors including Bartolomeo, Bellamy, Cavendish (watching), Don Chinjao, Blue Gilly, Tank Lepanto, Ricky, Hack, Dagama, and King Elizabello II.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most important tournament blocks featuring several characters who will play crucial roles in the Dressrosa arc and beyond.

keyEvents.title: Bartolomeo Throws Fake Bomb
keyEvents.description: Bartolomeo throws a fake bomb into the Corrida Colosseum crowd, causing mass panic among the spectators.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the dangerous and unpredictable nature of the tournament competitors and the colosseum's chaotic atmosphere.

statusHistory.reason: Colosseum is operational and hosting the tournament
